#Text=Ten killed in helicopter crash in Argentina , French Olympians among the dead
#Text=Thursday , March 12 , 2015
#Text=File photo of a ' Eurocopter ' , similar to the aircraft involved in the collision .
#Text=Image : Elisabeth Klimesch .
#Text=Three French sport stars are among the dead following a helicopter crash on Monday in Villa Castelli , Argentina .
#Text=In total , ten people died after the crash , which involved two helicopters .
#Text=The dead included passengers and both pilots in the mid-air collision .
#Text=The victims were taking part in the French reality television show ' Dropped ' when the accident happened .
#Text=The victims included Olympic swimmer Camille Muffat , Olympic boxer Alexis Vastine and Florence Arthaud , a yachtswoman .
#Text=Both pilots were Argentinian , the remainder of the victims were French and worked as part of the television shows production team .
#Text=Bodies of all ten of the victims have been retrieved and taken to the morgue .
#Text=The accident occurred while both helicopters were flying at a low altitude in tandem .
#Text=Amateur camera footage shows the helicopters colliding when one appears to fly into the path of the other .
#Text=It remains unclear what caused actions which lead to the crash .
#Text=Cesar Angulo , Secretary of Security for La Rioja , the province in which the accident happened released an update .
#Text=He said " An explosion occurred and it 's believed that they must have collided .

#Text=They said  We learn with immense sadness of the accident that occurred during the filming of the show ' Dropped . ' [ Staff ] come together in this terrible time with the pain of the families and those close to the victims " .

column1: #Text=French media announced that all contestants and crew are returning home and that filming had been suspended .
#Text=Muffat became the Olympic champion in the 400m freestyle event at the 2012 Summer Olympics in London , England .
#Text=The 25-year-old also won a silver and bronze medal at the same games in different events .
#Text=Vastine , 28 , also competed at the 2012 games , being eliminated from the Light Welterweight category in the quarter finals .
#Text=He won a gold medal in the 2008 games in Beijing , China .
#Text=Arthaud , 57 , was a yachtswoman who won the 1990 Route du Rhum .
